choices: Go directly home. Mom would love these daisies we found.
I'm sure Amy would love the roses we picked for her.
Sally seems depressed. Let's give her these Sunflowers to cheer her up.
She met someone along the way
1.content:
Cream was humming to herself as she and Cheese were picking flowers in the garden. After the aftermath of Naugus almost taking control of the kingdom (Authors note: Does not know final outcome) it seemed that she was in need to relax for a bit. So, Cream decided to take Cheese and go the flower patch near the village to pick flowers for her friends.

"And one for you, and one for you...and two for you. Hee-hee", Cream giggled as she prepared several bouquets for her friends and family.

Cheese flew over her head, depositing several lilies on to her head. Giggling at her friends intention, Cream looked at Cheese with a bit of disappointment.

"Oh, Cheese. We can't use these. They are for those whom are morning the loss of loved ones", Cream said while waggling her finger at the chao, "Try getting some more tulips instead. Mom really likes those".

Cheese nodded in assent and flew off in pursuit of the flowers.

After several hours, they had gathered several lovely bouquets and were on their way back to the village when she felt her foot connect with a rock, causing her to trip and fall, scattering the flowers every which-way.

"Oh no!" Cream cried, "And we worked so hard on those. 'Sigh'. C'mon Cheese. Let's gather them up".

After gathering the flowers, Cream happened to look at the object she had tripped on. It turned out there were but two of them. And they suspiciously looked like...

"Chaos emeralds?" Cream asked picking the rocks up with ease. Sure enough, both crystals had the same shape of the emeralds that the kingdom had known for years; one green, the other ruby red.

"Wow, I can't wait to show this to Mr. Sonic!" Cream said cheerfully, "He's going to be so surprised!"

Then she frowned, staring at the flowers, "Oh, but if I take too long the flowers will wilt".

Cheese seemed to understand the problem and gave Cream the according answer.

"OK. We'll take the flowers first to everyone, then we can go see Mr. Sonic. Thank you, Cheese!" Cream said.

And with that, both of them went off into the village, flowers and stones in hand.

But who to visit first?
1.title: And so it begins....

11.content:
Cream decides to visit her mother first. She was most distraught when she had joined team Fighters, but was glad Cream had little participation and merely helped guide the citizen's to safety. As soon as she had gotten home to the hut Nicole had built them, she promptly went to the closet to pull out several vases and placed each of bouquets in them, filling them with enough water to keep them healthy. Then, she grabbed the vase with daisies and called out, "Mom? Are you in here?"

Nothing replied but a faint echo.

Cream searched the entire house till she noticed a small note in the kitchen.

"Dear Cream.

Gone out to grocers today. Out of milk and carrots. Make sure the house stays tidy till I get back. If you have any problems, contact Amy right away.

Love, Mom."

Oh, she's not going to be back for a while, Cream thought, her ears drooping.

"Well, at least I can deliver the flowers to everyone else" Cream said, "And I should still have enough time to tend to the house!"

Cream joyfully grabbed several vases, while Cheese grabbed one, and both left the house, leaving the two emeralds on the counter where they glowed ominously.




WHO IS AFFECTED FIRST?
11.title: Go directly home. Mom would love these daisies ...

111.content:
After delivering the flowers to each individual person, Cream returned back to her home and found that no one was home yet. Slightly disappointed, but knowing that grocery shopping was a long process, Cream set the daisies down on the kitchen counter and proceeded to play with Cheese. They skipped in the living room, played tea with some of Cream's dolls and even tried their hands at a war re-enactment (of course, the opposition won, but that's not either here nor there).

Finished with their game, and her mother still not home, Cream suddenly remembered the gems she had wanted to show Sonic. Reaching for them, Cream first grabbed...
111.title: Cream

1111.content:
...the green gem. Staring at it for only a second, there was suddenly a brilliant flash and Cream, startled by this change, dropped the emerald. It was at this point, blinded as she was, Cream was suddenly very dizzy.

"Oh my, what's going on?" Cream said, feeling nausious at the same time. Then, her glove fell off her right hand.

Cream, seeing the item in question fall, stared at her other hand. The glove was seemingly larger than she remembered.

"I'm...shwinking?" Cream asked, then was surprised as to her own speech impediment. Dashing to the mirror, losing her shoes in the process and trying not to trip over her dress, Cream saw that she was indeed smaller than normal. In fact, one could argue that she looked as if she were 3 years old again.

And she was still dwindling.

"No!" Cream screamed in horror, "Me no wanna be bah-bee!" She tried to run for help, but her legs gave on her, and she fell on her face. Pain roared across her entire body and she proceeded to bawl at the top of her lungs.

It was only a few minutes later, but a one year old Cream just sat there, covered in what remained of her red dress and her previous life.
1111.title: Green: Age regression.

11113.content: Who was the surprise guest?
11113.title: Who's there?

1112.content:
...the red gem. Cream took a closer look as to the jewels colors and stared deeply into it's blood red color. Suddenly there was a bit of a flash as Cream dropped the gem onto the ground.
"Oh! Clumsy me!" Cream said as she bent down. But it seemed she had to bend down a lot more than normal to pick up the gem. Cream, confused, stood up. And up. And up.
"What's-" Cream said, looking at the nearest mirror and seeing herself rising up in height, her dress shrinking on her growing body.
"I'm...growing?" Cream asked, suddenly noticing her lower pitched voice. "My...my voice!"
Suddenly Cream noticed bulges in her chest as she shot through puberty, her dress straining to break free, her panties getting tighter and tighter.
"It...hurts!" Cream grunted, and just as soon as it started, it stopped. Cream looked just as her clothes snapped and broke, revealing a naked teenaged Cream in front of herself in the mirror.
"Wha...I'm...older?" Cream asked, looking at herself and turning to inspect. In retrospect, she was a smaller frame of her mother, but unlike her, she had a smaller breast size.
1112.title: Red: Age progression.

11121.content: And who would it be that would be knocking on the rabbit's door? The choice is yours...
11121.title: Someone comes for a visit

111211.content:
Suddenly there was a knock on the door, followed by the door opening as Amy Rose walked into the room.
"Cream, are you here? Thanks for the flowers, I-" Amy was stopped by the sight of the now nude rabbit standing before her.
"Va-Vanilla?" Amy cried.
"No, Amy, it's me!" Cream cried, trying to get a hold of the situation while keeping herself covered.
*minutes later*
"So let me get this straight", Amy said, looking at the still nude rabbit, "These stones helped you grow older, and now you are like this?"
Cream nodded her head.
"Well, let's try it out!" Amy said, grabbing both stones in one hand.
"No! Don't!" Cream cried, but the power was already in effect. But because Amy grabbed both, the mixture of the two created a strange result. Which was it?
111211.title: Amy

choices: Someone else is at the door.
1112112.content:
There was a very large flash of light as both Cream and Amy were engulfed in the effect. Afterwards, the flash ended and Cream saw that both she and Amy were left unharmed.
"What happened?" Amy asked.
"Amy, you can't just grab stuff. I don't know how these stones work. For all I know, you could have grown into an old woman!" Cream scolded.
"Cream, I'm sorry", Amy said, regretting her rashness.
"It's okay. Let's just hope nothing bad happened", Cream muttered.
"Okay, okay! Sheesh, don't be such a baby", Amy said.
At that instant, Cream felt her bowels release as a stream of pee ejected from her. Amy's eyes widened.
"Hey! I didn't mean that literally!" Amy cried stepping back.
"What do you-?" Cream started, but then felt the wetness on her thighs as she looked down to see herself peeing, "What?!"
Amy, about to try to calm Cream, felt an equal wetness as she began to pee through her panties and onto the floor. They stared at each other, still peiing, eyes wide in horror and confusion.
"What's happening to us?" Amy said.
1112112.title: Green over red: (loss of bladder)

111212.content: Who else comes to visit?
111212.title: someone else

1112122.content: Who else comes to visit?
1112122.title: Blaze?

11121221.content:
(Several Minutes ago):

In the middle of the Turquoise hills, a circle of fire engulfed the lands. When it settled, Blaze the cat, princess of the sol dimension, appeared amidst the grass and flowers. Holding the Sol emerald in her hand, Blaze gazed at queerly.
"Why did it bring me here? Is there another Sol emerald nearby?" Blaze thought aloud to herself. She looked towards her surroundings.
"I must be in Sonic's world again. I don't recognize anything here. Less water too", Blaze continued, "Maybe I can find Cream and Amy to help. It would be nice to see them again".
And with that, Blaze took off, scorching the ground as she went.

(Eventually):

Blaze soon arrived at Cream's house since it was closer than all the other huts. Soon, she knocked at the door and waited.
Silence.
Hmmm...you'd think that she would be excited to see me again. I wonder if something is wrong... Blaze thought to herself.
Just then the door opened and a rabbit wrapped in a towel answered the door. Blaze could see the resemblance to Vanilla and Cream, but she wasn't familiar to this person. She may be a distant cousin.
"Blaze?" the rabbit asked.
"Forgive the intrusion, but is Cream the Rabbit at home?"
"Blaze, it's me! I'm Cream!"

How does Blaze react?
11121221.title: Blaze

11122.content: What exactly did Cream have in mind?
11122.title: A closer look.

choices: Examine the red gem even further
111222.content: What does Cream do next?
111222.title: Something else.

choices: Asked who this grown rabbit was.
11123.content: Vanilla soon entered the house, saying "Cream, I'm home!" She then saw the now grown-up Cream and...
11123.title: Mama's home.

1113.content:
Cream had grabbed both gems and, for a few seconds, they seemed to glow. Strangely, nothing happened... At least, it didn't seem that anything had happened.

"I wonder if these are real Chaos Emeralds or just fakes?" said Cream to herself. Just then...
1113.title: Precious!

11133.content: Perhaps someone else was effected by the brief glow?
11133.title: Interesting development...

112.content:
Vanilla got home nearly 20 min. after Cream had left. A bag of groceries in her hand, she sauntered into the kitchen and set her bag down.

"Oh, the clerk was most helpful today", she said aloud to herself. Then she called out, "Cream? Are you there?"

Once more an echo pervaded the house, but nothing came back in reply.

Must still be out playing with Cheese, Vanilla sighed. But then, a thought came to her: What if she's out doing something dangerous again?

"I know she's part of a team now, but a mother can still worry. Right?" Vanilla once again asked herself. Then, she noticed the jewels on the counter.

"Wait. Aren't these-?" Vanilla asked as she reached out for one of the gems.

But which one does she pick up?
112.title: Vanilla

1121.content:
Vanilla picked up the green emerald and examined it.

"I thought so" Vanilla said, "Mary did mention her son having found several of these. But why are they-?"

With a flash, the green emerald exploded in light. Vanilla cried out in shock, but just as soon as it had begun, it vanished.

"What was that?" Vanilla asked, staggering from the brilliance she had witnessed, setting the emerald back to the counter. But as she set the gem back down, she noticed her arms were a bit shorter than they used to be.

"What the-?" Vanilla cried as all of a sudden she realized that she was shrinking. She hurried to her room, loosing her shoes in the process as she headed to the full length mirror to examine what was happening.

As she stared in the mirror, she watched as lines started to disappear from her face, she lost inches from her height, and her bust size seemed to be decreasing as well.

"I'm getting younger!" Cried Vanilla as she continued to watch.

In a matter of minutes, Vanilla had shrunken to that of a high-school girl version of herself (roughly 18) her clothes slowly drooping around her smaller frame.

And just when she thought it couldn't get any worse....
1121.title: Green: Age regression

11211.content:
It stopped.

Vanilla continued to stare at what she was looking at. It was herself, as she had once been when she was no more than a teenager in high school. She touched the window slowly to make sure it wasn't a phony. Then she moved onto her own arms, pinching them in a process.

"No. It's not a dream", Vanilla said, in shock and awe. Then in a triumphant cry of pure joy she cried out loud, "I'm YOUNG again!"

Dancing around, her dress twirling in the room, Vanilla was in pure joy of her renewed youth. But how much had changed? Vanilla decided a further investigation was needed.

She proceeded to remove her dress, letting it fall to the floor as she stood in only her panties and loose bra, which soon followed suit.

Her hands then proceeded to her now upright breasts, jiggling them in the process. They hadn't shrunk so much, but they were much more upright than what Vanilla would be years later.

A cold wind was blowing through her room, perking up Vanilla's nipples.

Vanilla...
11211.title: It stopped...

112112.content:
So, who came by to interrupt the now younger Vanilla? Would it be Vanilla's daughter, coming back from delivering flowers?
Or would it be Amy Rose, who came by with a grocery bag that Vanilla left at the store?

YOU DECIDE!!!!
112112.title: was interrupted by someone.

1121122.content: Is it really Amy Rose or someone else?
1121122.title: Amy rose

11212.content: How young did Vanilla get?
11212.title: Young lady... Maybe too young!

112121.content: How young did Vanilla get?
112121.title: Preteen age (10-13).

1122.content: How old does Vanilla get?
1122.title: A more mature mama.

12.content: "I'm sure Amy would love the roses we picked for her" said Cream. So she and Cheese went off to find Amy. They found her at...
12.title: To Amy!

choices: Yes, but with a little outside help.
121.content: Cream didn't have to search long or hard to find Amy; in fact, Amy came to her... sort of. Sonic dashed by Cream, a worried look on his face. Seconds later, Amy followed, hearts in her eyes and a net in her hands. Was this going to be the time that Amy finally caught Sonic?
121.title: Amy on the move.

1212.content: So, Amy failed... Again. What are the odds? But what caused her failure?
1212.title: What did you expect?

1213.content: Who helped Amy get Sonic?
1213.title: A helping hand.

123.content: Amy was at the park. Judging on her sad expression, another attempt at getting Sonic had blown up in her face... The poor thing. Cream decided to...
123.title: Meeting a friend.

125.content: It took Cream a while to find Amy, but she found her at...
125.title: Where's Amy?

13.content:
Cream had noticed that Sally seemed rather depressed as of late. She couldn't figure out why.

"Maybe these sunflowers will cheer her up" thought Cream.

She went off to find Sally. She found her in...
13.title: Happiness booster.

131.content: Where in the castle was Sally?
131.title: Original royalty status.

1311.content:
Cream had found Sally; she was seated in the throne room, a glum look on her face.

"Hi, Sally!" said Cream. "I figured you could use some flowers to cheer you up".

A small smile crossed Sally's face. "Thank you, Cream" she said.

Unbeknownst to Cream or Sally, those flowers had been touched by a bit of magic. As soon as Sally touched the flowers...
1311.title: The head chair.

13112.content:
Sally carefully took the sunflowers from Cream, smiling slightly. Being turned into a robot for over a year had been beyond torture. To make matters worse, the council had suffered no repurcussions for their blunder of making Naugus king, and had immediately sent Sonic off to kick Eggman while he was down, leaving her without the support of her partner. Bunnie was getting used to her new cybernetics and spending time with Antoine, who had only just come out of hospital, while Tails and Rotor were still fighting to get Nicole reinstated. She'd tried turning to Amy, but the hedgehogwas a fairweather friend to her at the best of times, even with her best efforts to mature, she had issues controlling her jealousy. The only friend she had was Nicole, and since she'd been cut off from the city, she could no longer manifest physically, leaving the young squirrel feeling more alone than ever. Sally was tall for her age, and as a result, people tended to forget that she was barely on the cusp of adulthood. At least, however, the ever-cheerful Cream would occasionally visit with some flowers. Sure, Sally wasn't much of one for flowers, she frequented the garden because it reminded her of her youth in the forest, but the gesture was more than enough to raise her spirits a little.

Taking a sniff of her gift, Sally was about to compliment the scent and give the little rabbit a pat on the head, when a strange feeling rippled through her.
13112.title: Something happens.

131121.content: Sally paused, her body tingling. Her eyes widened as she felt herself shift.
131121.title: She begins to change physically.

131121221.content: Both girls watched in surprise, as Sally's body began to shrink. Her chest shrank away, as did her backside, as her muscle melted into lingering baby fat. She got smaller and smaller, face becoming softer and rounder all the time, until she had the same height and proportions as Cream. A little, six-year old squirrel sat on the chair, staring at herself.
131121221.title: cream's age

131122.content: How does Sally's mind change?
131122.title: Royal reprogramming.

14.content:
For a story to be divided,
A choice must be made,
So what strange occurrance,
Must be played?

Would the dimensional boundaries break again,
To show friends from far away?
Or will a friendly hologram
help the city in some way?

The decision is yours fair reader,
and if in doubt
Choose the best story
you want to write about.
14.title: Suddenly, something unexpected happened

141.content: Just then, a portal from another dimension opened and someone stepped out. It was...
141.title: Other world dimension visit!

1413.content: Perhaps a timeline cross is in order?
1413.title: Tick, tock.

143.content: Perhaps a visit by many people would be more to your liking?
143.title: Multiple visitors?

15.content: So who does Cream meet while on her way? Will it be a friend, or some villain of a sort?
15.title: She met someone along the way

151.content:
Just then, Rouge swooped down in front of Cream.

"Hello, Miss Rouge" said Cream.

Rouge...
151.title: A robbery in broad daylight?

1512.content: How many did she take?
1512.title: Yoink!

choices: She tried to trade some treasure she had for the gems.
She asked if she could see those gems a little closer.
1513.title: Next step.

152.content:
Just then, Cream ran into Tikal. She didn't know her that well, but she was a friend of Knuckles, so that was good.

"Hi, Ms. Tikal" said Cream.

Tikal responded, but with a distinct tone. Her tone was decidedly...
152.title: Visit from an echidna princess.

choices: I need those gems you found!
I need your experience with Chaos.
1522.content:
"It's good to see you, Cream, but I need your help!" said Tikal.

"What do you need?" said Cream.
1522.title: Time to be serious!

153.content: is it shade or tails or someone else
153.title: Shade

154.content:
As Cream was suddenly skipping along the way she heard a strange sound that almost seemed familiar. The realization that laughter had punctuated the air caused her to turn around when she saw Dr. Robotnik floating in his hover craft.

"Ah! Why if it isn't Cream? I haven't seen you since...well, the last olympics games? How are you dear?" The doctor said, in his most evil yet sweet voice.

"Um...um...um..." Cream said, her eyes going wide.

Not paying attention, the doctor stared at his gloves for a minute, then said, "Well, that's nice...NOW HAND OVER THOSE EMERALDS OR I'LL-"

"YAAAAH!!!" Cream cried, throwing both the flowers and the emeralds into the air. The doctor, using an arm attachment on his craft, caught the emeralds nimbly and flew off.

"Now...to analyze these crystals before the blasted hedgehog gives me any more trouble..." Robotnik said.

*minutes later*

Robotnik had continued to analyze the gems, his two lackeys, orb-bot and cub-bot, standing behind him.

"AHA! These aren't chaos emeralds! They're energy power is far too insufficient to be linked to them", the doctor said.

"A brilliant deduction as normally sir, but if they're not the emeralds we were looking for...then what are they?" Orb-bot asked.

"Costume jewelry? Rock candy...Ooh! I love me some of that there rock candy. Gives me glitches, but boy-oh-boy does it taste-" Cub-bot said.

"Silence! There is only one way to properly test this out", Robotnik said, 'Snively, report to my office in 30 mins."

*30 mins later*

Snively entered the door, wondering what his uncle would have needed for him now, "You called, Dr Robotnik?"

"Indeed I did, nephew!" Robotnik cried and pushed the green button on his latest device: a gun with two chambers on the sides with one stone in each, and two modes of fire, according to the doctors schematics.

Snively gave a cry of fear as the green bolt hit him. The next thing anybody knew, where Snively once stood, there was in his place a small ugly baby with clothes strewn about him. Looking up at the doctor, the infant proceeded to cry at the strange man.

"AHA! Do you know what this means?" Dr. Robotnik asked his lackeys.

"Um...that we're going to need a nursery in the Death Egg?" Cub-bot asked.

"Fool! We're going to finally stop that miserable blue pest once and for all! By altering the reality we live in, causing all of him and his pesky friends to turn into elderly people, allowing me the easiest point of conquering the entire planet! NOTHING CAN STOP ME NOW!!!!" The doctor cried.

"I feel a sudden case of deja vu. Doctor, if you'll permit me, the hedgehog is too fast! How will we plan to catch him? And for that matter, it's worked fine on your nephew, but how will we know it will work on a mobian?" Orb-bot implored.

Robotnik thought on those words, "Hmm...maybe you're right. This would be a too delicate procedure to botch up too soon. What shall I do?"
154.title: Dr. Robotnik?

1543.content: Robotnik needed a Mobian in order to ensure that his plan would work. The question is- who would he use in his insidious experiment?
1543.title: A Mobian victim.

info.brief_description: The gals from Sonic series are going through some changes: mental and physical.
info.description:
When Cream finds what appear to be 2 chaos emeralds lying on the ground, she decides to show it off to her friends. However, what she doesn't realize is the dangers it could change them all...FOREVER!!!!

The majority of the story should involve the females of the Sonic Universe growing younger and older. Males can be included in the story, but transformations should be kept to a minimum with them. Also, please no male/male. You can have a relationship with the characters going, but please no yaoi. Yuri and hetero, however, is excepted.

The only transformations involved in this story should be limited to Age regression and Progression. This can be done by either clothing (morphing into something older or younger [though you can leave them unchanged and have them busting or falling out of them]), physical gain or loss, and mental programming. Also you can start off with the characters having a diaper thing, I don't mind.

Story pages should at least have some plot to them, so no simple sentences. This is everyone's story guys. Get creative. Show some spirit. And in all intents and purposes, have fun with it.

All Characters Copyright SEGA
